posts.post_title: for sale: T204 Sallee, Sebring, Spencer all SGC-graded
posts.post_content:
3 SGC T204's, all sold.  

If you're interested, you can PM me or respond here.  I'll cover the shipping costs.  Thanks.

Sebring (SGC 50): [S]$140[/S] SOLD
Spencer (SGC 40): [S]$110[/S] SOLD
Sallee (SGC 30):  [S]$85[/S]  SOLD
